db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: A Qt3DRender::QClearBuffers FrameGraph node enables clearing of the specific render target buffers with specific values.

db:section.db:title: buffers : enumeration
db:section.db:para: Specifies the buffer type to be used.

db:section.db:title: clearColor : color
db:section.db:para: Specifies the clear color to be used.

db:section.db:title: clearDepthValue : real
db:section.db:para: Specifies the clear depth value to be used.

db:section.db:title: clearStencilValue : int
db:section.db:para: Specifies the stencil value to be used.

db:section.db:title: colorBuffer : RenderTargetOutput
db:section.db:para: Specifies a specific color buffer to clear. If set to NULL (default), and ColorBuffer flag is set, all color buffers will be cleared.
